tests.title: Every table has exactly (rows + 1) entries

tests.fullTitle: Plinko Game Profiles All multipliers are positive finite numbers

tests.fullTitle: Plinko Game Profiles High risk has highest edge multipliers at position 0 for all row counts

tests.title: Generator produces correct slot for all captured bets
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Generator produces correct slot for all captured bets

tests.title: Known example: nonce=4, rows=16, high → slot 8
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Known example: nonce=4, rows=16, high → slot 8
tests.code:
const slot = await generator.generatePlinkoResult("4351b2c37e32c3575ccbcd51214ff1ca6da8b460dc15f9bb7930e0c753795204", "PH_NW_777fLkqsHC", 4, 16);
(0, chai_1.expect)(slot).to.eql(8);

tests.title: Known example: nonce=5, rows=8, low → slot 6
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Known example: nonce=5, rows=8, low → slot 6
tests.code:
const slot = await generator.generatePlinkoResult("4351b2c37e32c3575ccbcd51214ff1ca6da8b460dc15f9bb7930e0c753795204", "PH_NW_777fLkqsHC", 5, 8);
(0, chai_1.expect)(slot).to.eql(6);

tests.title: Known example: nonce=16, rows=16, high → slot 11

tests.code:

(0, chai_1.expect)(slot).to.eql(11);

tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Known example: nonce=26, rows=9, high → slot 7
tests.code:

(0, chai_1.expect)(slot).to.eql(7);

tests.code:

(0, chai_1.expect)(slot).to.eql(11);

tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Result is deterministic – same inputs always produce same slot

tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Different nonces produce different results

tests.title: Slot is always in valid range [0, rows]
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Results Generator Tests Slot is always in valid range [0, rows]

tests.title: Returns betAmount * tableMultiplier for each risk/rows/slot combination
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Returns betAmount * tableMultiplier for each risk/rows/slot combination

tests.title: Returns 0 for bet amount 0
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Returns 0 for bet amount 0
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(0, 4, 8, "low")).to.eql(0);

tests.title: Throws on negative bet amount
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Throws on negative bet amount
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(() => PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(-1, 4, 8, "low")).to.throw();

tests.title: Throws on invalid rows (< 8)
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Throws on invalid rows (< 8)
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(() => PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(1, 3, 7, "low")).to.throw();

tests.title: Throws on invalid rows (> 16)
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Throws on invalid rows (> 16)
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(() => PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(1, 8, 17, "low")).to.throw();

tests.title: Throws on bucketPosition > rows
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Throws on bucketPosition > rows
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(() => PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(1, 9, 8, "low")).to.throw();

tests.title: Throws on negative bucketPosition
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests Throws on negative bucketPosition
tests.code: (0, chai_1.expect)(() => PlinkoWinCalculator_1.PlinkoWinCalculator.calculateWinnings(1, -1, 8, "low")).to.throw();

tests.title: High risk gives higher variance payouts than low risk for same rows
tests.fullTitle: Plinko Win Calculator Tests High risk gives higher variance payouts than low risk for same rows
